name: Adventure Fighting
description:
The game is about a mice living in a Kingdom far away where some
citizens of the Kingdom stepped into a web of intrigue against the
Queen. Once Noser and his aunt come to the Kingdom looking for a job.
Noser's adventure starts from this moment.

Gameplay:

Noserland is a cartoon adventure-fighting game with a simple to learn
interface for kids and not only for them. During passing levels of the
game a player enjoys the third person view. Also, there is a help arrow
that can be called at any moment of the game. As a result of that a
player does not get lost and this makes easy to discover the Noserland
world. Noser does not kill his opponents. When a mob loses a fight he
just runs away. Also, when a player punishes the main boss a player gets
an access to bonus levels. Also, during the game a player has the
opportunity to collect game coins and spend them in the village shop.

Features:

- no blood content

- no killing, only punishing

- classic fighting view

- simple interface

- additional levels with bosses
